title: Whenever more than one exit is required for a floor of a building, exits shall be placed at remote from each other as possible
clause_text: Whenever more than one exit is required for a floor of a building, exits shall be placed at remote from each other as possible. All the exits shall be accessible from the entire floor area at all floor levels.
